org.magdaaproject.utils
Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.magdaaproject.utils.FileUtils

public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object

a utility class which exposes utility methods for interacting with files and the filesystem

check to see if a directory is writeable if it exists, if it doesn't exist this method tries to create it

writeNewGzipFile

public static java.lang.String writeNewGzipFile(java.lang.String contents,
                                                java.lang.String fileName,
                                                java.lang.String directory)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
write a file with the specified content using the supplied name in the required directory compressing the file using the gzip algorithm

Parameters:
contents - the contents of the file
fileName - the name of the new file, excluding the .gz extension
directory - the name of the directory
Returns:
the full path to the new file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if something bad happens
